meaningMnemonic: A (fresh water) <radical>tsunami</radical>. Some <radical>horns</radical>. The <radical>ground</radical>. A bunch of <radical>poop</radical>. Combine these together and let them decompose a while. You'll have yourself some very <kanji>nourishing</kanji> soil.
